m_guestComments.comment: The statue of Hippocrates captures his dignified presence, as he stands robed in traditional Greek attire, holding a scroll that signifies his lasting influence on medical science.
Wondering about the context of this piece.

m_curatorComment.comment: The statue of Hippocrates, known as the Father of Medicine, portrays him standing with a serene expression, holding a scroll in one hand, symbolizing his contributions to medical knowledge. Dressed in traditional ancient Greek attire, his figure exudes wisdom and authority, inspiring respect and admiration.
